General.Name: Nanjing University Environmental
General.Description: Academy of Environmental Planning and Design, Co.,Ltd. Nanjing University, operates an institute for higher learning and research centers in China and internationally. It provides environmental science research and teaching services. The company offers environmental protection services, including investigation and identification, planning and design, environmental impact assessment consultation, supervision and inspection, education and training, incubation investment, industry-university-research cooperation, and infrastructure construction and operation for various levels of government and development zones. It also provides services to alumni working in environmental protection related fields. The company is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: Shaw Management Science Building, Nanjing, China
